name: The Illustrated Barber
description: A small appointment manager that allows customers to schedule time with a service provider.

name: Markers
description: Markers is a node module for programmatic markdown generation.

name: Cherrypicker
description: An interactive Node.js app that creates and maintains match threads on the subreddits of your choice.  Updates automatically via home team's Twitter account.

name: PickUp
description: A MEAN stack grocery app that tracks prices and purchasing history.

name: KRM Coat Drive
description: A MEAN stack pledge tracker for a Kentucky Refugee Ministries coat drive.

name: Cloud Seeder
description: A chrome extension that helps you find and consume free downloads on Soundcloud.com

name: GOP Whack-a-Mole
description: A browser based javascript game that utilizes CSS Flexbox to play on mobile and desktop

name: WRFL Timer
description: A chrome extension that acts as a visual alarm clock, helping WRFL DJs stay on pace and stick to the traffic guide

name: POS Paint
description: An experiment with CSS Flexbox and terrible rendition of MS Paint.

name: WRFL Bot
description: WRFL bot scrapes the WRFL playlist, tweeting out the daily, weekly, and monthly charts and responding to simple questions from followers
